params.defense: None on n1/n3/n5 etc. Basic on n2/n4/n6 etc.

fields.name: Ability:
fields.value:
* Every 2nd night bite someone to infect them, turning them into this role every 2nd night. Their allignment does not change and they will be able to use their old abilities every other night.
* This is not a conversion. This role's wincon will be added to the target's wincon.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: * If the original dies, the first bitten will turn into this role through conversion. If this isnt possible, go down the ladder and turn the next most bitten into this. This may only happen once.

fields.name: Wincon:
fields.value: Have everyone in the game be a werewolf
